titleStmt.title: Ovids remedy of love directing lovers how they may by reason suppresse the passion of love.
Remedia amoris. English
titleStmt.author: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Smith, and are to be sold at his shop neare Holburne Conduit, at the signe of the Sunne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
